SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.is24am03
Package it.polimi.ingsw.is24am03.client.connection

Class ClientSocket

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.is24am03.client.connection.ClientSocket
All Implemented Interfaces:
Client
public class ClientSocket extends Object implements Client
Represents a client-side socket connection to interact with a server for a game. Manages communication using object serialization over TCP/IP.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ClientSocket(String ip, int port, ViewInterface view)
    Constructs a ClientSocket object to connect to the specified server IP and port, using the provided ViewInterface for interaction.

      public ClientSocket(String ip, int port, ViewInterface view)
      Constructs a ClientSocket object to connect to the specified server IP and port, using the provided ViewInterface for interaction.
      Parameters:
      ip - The IP address of the server
      port - The port number of the server
      view - The ViewInterface implementation (either GUI or CLI)
